TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IntranetZoneCredentialPolicy extends System.Object implements class System.Net.ICredentialPolicy

summary.span: 對於使用 與其衍生類別 (Derived Class) 所產生的資源要求，定義其使用的認證原則。

span.span: Defines a credential policy to be used for resource requests that are made using and its derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此原則可讓您傳送僅要求的資源是否在提出要求的用戶端與位於相同網域的認證。This policy allows credentials to be sent only if the requested resource is in the same domain as the client that is making the request. 對於許多應用程式這會是最佳的原則，因為它會防止網路認證要求傳送不是位於內部網路上的資源。For many applications this is the optimal policy because it prevents network credentials from being sent with requests for resources that are not on the intranet. > [!NOTE] > 原則會叫用，只有當或相關聯要求有認證不`null`。 policies are invoked only if the or the that is associated with the request has credentials that are not `null`. 設定此原則會有不會影響未指定認證的要求。Setting this policy has no effect on requests that do not specify credentials. 使用屬性來設定原則。Use the property to set the policy. 控制代碼驗證要求將會叫用方法，然後再執行驗證。The that handles authentication for the request will invoke the method before performing the authentication. 如果要求的資源位在不同的網域，用戶端，比方法會傳回`false`，並不會執行驗證。If the requested resource is in a different domain than the client, the method returns `false`, and authentication is not performed. 此原則影響的所有執行個體使用目前的應用程式定義域中的非 null 認證。This policy affects all instances of with non-null credentials in the current application domain. 無法覆寫原則，以在個別的要求。The policy cannot be overridden on individual requests. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立執行個體並用它來設定應用程式定義域的認證原則。The following code example demonstrates creating an instance of and using it to set the credential policy for the application domain. [!code-cpp[NclCredPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CPP/NCLCredPolicy.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NclCredPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CS/websample.cs#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式會使用這個建構函式來建立物件，可以用來設定屬性。Applications use this constructor to create objects that can be used to set the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立此類別的執行個體。The following code example demonstrates creating an instance of this class. MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool ShouldSendCredential (Uri challengeUri, System.Net.WebRequest request, System.Net.NetworkCredential credential, System.Net.IAuthenticationModule authModule);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ShouldSendCredential(class System.Uri challengeUri, class System.Net.WebRequest request, class System.Net.NetworkCredential credential, class System.Net.IAuthenticationModule authModule) cil managed
Public Overridable Function ShouldSendCredential (challengeUri As Uri, request As WebRequest, credential As NetworkCredential, authModule As IAuthenticationModule) As Boolean
public: virtual bool ShouldSendCredential(Uri ^ challengeUri, System::Net::WebRequest ^ request, System::Net::NetworkCredential ^ credential, System::Net::IAuthenticationModule ^ authModule);

abstract member ShouldSendCredential : Uri * System.Net.WebRequest * System.Net.NetworkCredential * System.Net.IAuthenticationModule -> bool override this.ShouldSendCredential : Uri * System.Net.WebRequest * System.Net.NetworkCredential * System.Net.IAuthenticationModule -> bool

span.span: Returns a that indicates whether the client's credentials are sent with a request for a resource that was made using .

returns.span: 如果要求的資源與產生要求的用戶端在相同的網域，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the requested resource is in the same domain as the client making the request; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式進行不直接呼叫這個方法;它由呼叫，負責對伺服器進行驗證。Applications do not call this method directly; it is called by the that is responsible for performing authentication with the server. 如果這個方法會傳回`false`，則將不會驗證用戶端到伺服器。If this method returns `false`, the will not authenticate the client to the server. 會呼叫這個方法只會針對要求指定的認證，或使用物件，指定認證。This method is called only for requests that specify credentials or use a object that specifies credentials. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範衍生自以允許使用安全超文字傳輸通訊協定 」 (HTTPS) 使用基本驗證的要求傳送的認證。The following code example demonstrates deriving from to allow credentials to be sent for requests that use Secure Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTPS) with basic authentication. 使用 HTTPS 和基本驗證，然後再透過網路傳送加密的使用者密碼。Using HTTPS and basic authentication, the user password is encrypted before being sent over the network. [!code-cpp[NclCredPolicy#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CPP/NCLCredPolicy.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NclCredPolicy#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CS/websample.cs#4)]
